properties.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 11 at 12:20PM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of a
half to near three quarters of an inch. Winds gusting as high as
55 mph near the entrance to the St Lawrence River.

* WHERE...Northern Jefferson county. Greatest ice accumulations
near the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Expect power outages and tree damage due to the ice.
Travel could be impossible. Strong winds could cause tree
damage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong west winds will develop late Sunday
morning through early Sunday afternoon, and could gust as high
as 55 mph, which could have an impact on any ice laden trees
and powerlines.
properties.instruction:
Travel may be nearly impossible due to ice covered surfaces
and/or downed tree limbs and powerlines.

NWSheadline: ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
